text: Kelvin Krash is a British music producer. == Career == He is from Willesden in North West London. He created music for ASAP Rocky featuring Playboi Carti and Smooky Margielaa. He worked with Swedish House Mafia. He released songs on his own. He later released song called “Promise You’ll Wait”. He said this song talks about the start of his journey. == Discography == === Studio albums === * KRASH (2023) === EPs === * K2 (with Kasien) (2019) == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Musicians from London Category:Hip hop record producers
title: Kelvin Krash
